${ModID}:PeasantQuest.TITLE: Peasant
${ModID}:PeasantQuest.DESCRIPTION: Have the number of commons in your deck, minus the number of uncommons and rares, be at least #b8.
${ModID}:PeasantQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:PackFanaticQuest.TITLE: Pack Fanatic
${ModID}:PackFanaticQuest.DESCRIPTION: Have a card from each of your packs in your deck.
${ModID}:PackFanaticQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:SuperiorEliteQuest.TITLE: Superior Elite
${ModID}:SuperiorEliteQuest.DESCRIPTION: The next elite you fight is more dangerous, with additional HP, damage, and #yArtifact. Defeat it to claim a reward!
${ModID}:SuperiorEliteQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:GatheringExpeditionQuest.TITLE: Gathering Expedition
${ModID}:GatheringExpeditionQuest.DESCRIPTION: New flowers/minerals/gems can be found throughout the Spire! Looked for specially marked rooms on the map and visit #b9 of them to craft a relic.
${ModID}:GatheringExpeditionQuest.AUTHOR: modargo
EXTRA_TEXT: New #rflowers can be found throughout the Spire! Looked for specially marked rooms on the map and visit #b9 of them to craft a #yFloral #yGarland.
New #yminerals can be found throughout the Spire! Looked for specially marked rooms on the map and visit #b9 of them to craft a #ySpire #yAlloy #yHelmet.
New #bgems can be found throughout the Spire! Looked for specially marked rooms on the map and visit #b9 of them to craft a #yJewelled #yBauble.

${ModID}:MulticlassQuest.TITLE: Multiclass
${ModID}:MulticlassQuest.DESCRIPTION: Cards from another character will show up in your card rewards. Add #b3 of their cards to your deck to embrace your new techniques.
${ModID}:MulticlassQuest.AUTHOR: modargo
EXTRA_TEXT: Cards from another character will show up in your card rewards. Add #b3 of their cards to your deck to embrace your new techniques.
Cards from %s will show up in your card rewards. Add #b3 of their cards to your deck to embrace your new techniques.

${ModID}:PlatinumCafeMemberQuest.TITLE: Platinum Cafe Member
${ModID}:PlatinumCafeMemberQuest.DESCRIPTION: The Cafe is running a special! Customers who buy out the bartender's offerings and finish a conversation with each Cafe patron will receive a small gift.
${ModID}:PlatinumCafeMemberQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:BloodfireRitualQuest.TITLE: Bloodfire Ritual
${ModID}:BloodfireRitualQuest.DESCRIPTION: Complete a long ritual to gain the #pBlackstaff. Each combat, shuffle a special #b1-cost #ySkill with #yEthereal, #yExhaust, and a small negative effect into your draw pile. Play these special cards #b20 times to complete the ritual.
${ModID}:BloodfireRitualQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:BountyDefectQuest.TITLE: Bounty: Blue Devil
${ModID}:BountyDefectQuest.DESCRIPTION: A devil of metal stalks these halls. The next elite this act is replaced by the #bDefect.
${ModID}:BountyDefectQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:RealityTwistQuest.TITLE: Reality Twist
${ModID}:RealityTwistQuest.DESCRIPTION: Something strange is going on... these enemies aren't supposed to be here! Your next #b4 normal fights are replaced by #punusual and #rdangerous enemy mixes.
${ModID}:RealityTwistQuest.AUTHOR: modargo

${ModID}:EmbraceTheCurseQuest.TITLE: Embrace the Curse
${ModID}:EmbraceTheCurseQuest.DESCRIPTION: Gain #pThe #pLiving #pCurse, which adds #rCurses to card rewards, draws a card when you draw one, and reduces some of their negative effects. Add #b%s #rCurses to your deck to gain a special card for each milestone (and have them start appearing in rewards too).
${ModID}:EmbraceTheCurseQuest.AUTHOR: modargo
